data.title: Location of Newcastle upon Tyne in England Map
data.meta_description: Where is Newcastle upon Tyne located? Find here Newcastle upon Tyne location on England map along with know interesting facts about the city.
data.text:
67

Newcastle upon Tyne, the vibrant city with a mix of historic architecture and lively nightlife, is like the urban hub where medieval castles meet bustling pubs. With its iconic Newcastle Castle, the scenic Quayside, and a mix of local music venues, itâ€™s a city that invites you to explore its rich history during the day and enjoy a lively nightlife in the evening. Located in Tyne and Wear, along the River Tyne. Home to the vibrant Newcastle Theatre Royal and the picturesque Jesmond Dene Park. Features the annual Newcastle International Film Festival, showcasing independent films and cinematic talent.
